data.description: A response object returned from the task count endpoint.

num_tasks.description: The number of tasks in a project.

num_incomplete_tasks.description: The number of incomplete tasks in a project.

num_completed_tasks.description: The number of completed tasks in a project.

num_milestones.description: The number of milestones in a project.

num_incomplete_milestones.description: The number of incomplete milestones in a project.

num_completed_milestones.description: The number of completed milestones in a project.
